concept.title: Troubleshooting Eucalyptus
concept.shortdesc: Provides common managment or configuration problems and solutions for fixing these problems.

conbody.p: To troubleshoot Eucalyptus, the administrator must know the location of the Eucalyptus components, that is, on which machine each component is installed. The administrator must have root access to each machine hosting the components and must know the network configuration connecting the components.
